Edges-Professional -- Female Human Novice Bard
Attributes (7 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d6 Strength: d6 Vigor: d6
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Armor Interference: -4 Agility w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Skills (14 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d6 Performance: (spi) d8 Riding: (agi) d6
Common Knowledge: (sma) d8+2 Persuasion: (spi) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Notice: (sma) d4 Repair: (sma) d8+2 Stealth: (agi) d4
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Aquan; Auran; Common
Skill Notes:
Fix It: +2 Repair/Raise cuts time by half
Troubadour: +2 Common Knowledge/May use Performance in place of Battle
All Thumbs: -2 using mechanical and electrical devices, critical failure breaks device
Armor Interference: -4 Performance and Agility-based skills w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Born In The Saddle: Free reroll on Riding; +2 mount Pace, +1 mount Run step
Danger Sense: +2 Notice (surprise)/Rolls Notice-2 in circumstances not normally subject to Notice
Sharp Tongued: May substitute Performance for Taunt
Size: 0 Deity: Iomedae
Advances: 3 Improvement Points: 10 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 2; Edge: 6; Skill: 2
Features
Edges (5 points): Bard; Born In The Saddle; Danger Sense; Fix It; Troubadour Hindrances: All Thumbs; Phobia; Quirk; Ruthless Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Bard: Has Arcane Background (Bard), Armor Interference, and Sharp Tongued features
Phobia: -1 on trait rolls in presence of phobia subject
Quirk: Has minor compulsion that occasionally causes trouble
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 7 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Leather Jacket Shield: None Weapons: Heavy Mace (d6+d6); Spiked Chain (d6+d6); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Heavy Mace Strength Penalty: Lowers damage to d6
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +3
Ruthless: Attacks those opposing personal goal
Arcana
Power Count: 3 Power Points: 10
Powers:
Arcane Protection: (1 PP) R8" Foes suffer -2 (Raise -4) on arcane attacks and damage against target for 5 rd
Beast Friend: (1/Size PP) R8" Target can speak with and control beast actions for 10 min
Empathy: (1 PP) R8" Self learns target emotions and surface thoughts, gains +1 Intimidation, Persuasion, Performance, and Taunt (Raise +2) for 5 rd (Spirit neg)
Fear: (2 PP) R8" Target Extra flees, Wild Card rolls on fear table (Spirit neg)
Healing: (3 PP) RTouch Restores 1 Wound (Raise 2) suffered in past hr
Illusion: (3 PP) R8" Creates 2" radius visual illusion for 5 rd
Sound/Silence: (1 PP) R40" Creates sound up to shout or R8" mutes 3" radius for 5 rd
Arcana Notes: Arcane Background (Bard): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
